Title: M1: Data Integrity Lock
Description: Define canonical symbols, intervals, adjustments, and corporate actions. Checksums and row-count parity across mirrored stores.

Title: M2: Benchmark Baselines
Description: Momentum, mean-reversion, regime classifiers, naÃ¯ve Bayes. Reproducible runs with fixed seeds.

Title: M3: Blind Historical Tests
Description: Time-sliced out-of-sample evaluations with embargo periods. No code access for validators.

Title: M4: Accuracy Thresholds Met
Description: Pre-set cutoffs for trend, reversal, anomaly detection. Thresholds met in 3 independent datasets.

Title: M5: NDA Private Tester Program Ready
Description: 10 testers onboarded under NDA. Secure portal, feedback capture, no PII leakage.

Title: M6: Messaging and Collateral
Description: Empirical value narrative, methodology guardrails, limits and ethics. Reviewed by external advisors.

Title: M7: Host-Led Presentation Assets
Description: Founder off-stage, live-switch plan, Q&A boundaries. 2 full rehearsals.

Title: M8: Pricing and Tiers
Description: Early Believer, Whale Table, Ghost Ticket. Benefits, limits, refund policy.

Title: M9: Key Issuance Mechanism
Description: Soulbound non-transferable keys. Issuance, expiry, revocation tested.

Title: M10: Financial Ops Ready
Description: Card + wire + crypto payments. Invoicing, dunning, refunds. Zero reconciliation drift.

Title: M11: Registration and KYC-Lite
Description: Pre-qualification, NDA checkbox, policy acceptance. Roster reconciles with payment.

Title: M12: Environment Hardening
Description: Host-only channels, moderation protocol, failover tested.

Title: M13: Live Event Run-of-Show
Description: Checklist ticker, host prompts, scene-switch markers, timing alerts.

Title: M14: Auction Mechanics
Description: Timeboxed auction, transparent rules, anti-sniping buffer. 3 mock auctions.

Title: M15: Post-Event Conversion Flows
Description: 72-hour subscriber upsell window. Landing pages live, discount codes tested.

Title: M16: Pricing Verification and Cohort Design
Description: $500, $1,500, $5,000/month tiers. SLA table, entitlements enforced.

Title: M17: Delivery Cadence and Packaging
Description: Weekly/biweekly drops, alert formats, revision policy. >70% open rate.

Title: M18: Renewal/Dunning and Churn Rescue
Description: 30/7/1 day reminders, grace periods, downgrade offers. Recovery rate target met.

Title: M19: Member Observability and NPS
Description: Structured surveys, NPS > 50, anomaly reports pipeline.

Title: M20: Compliance and Claims Governance
Description: Every claim linked to evidence artifact. Review passed before publish.

Title: M21: Identity Insulation
Description: No founder exposure. Proxy agents for all public comms.

Title: M22: Threat Model and Response Playbooks
Description: Doxxing, harassment, spear-phishing, deepfakes. Monitoring live.

Title: M23: Surface Minimization
Description: Separate domains, emails, PO boxes, entities. High-risk removed/obfuscated.

Title: M24: Legal Shields and NDAs
Description: Counsel-signed NDAs, terms, privacy policy. Enforcement runbooks tested.

Title: M25: Crisis Management Rehearsal
Description: Incident sims with comms trees. Hotwash report, improvements logged.
